. // Other country-specifics: Fuelt-exporting; OECD/LDC
. /*
> Originally Donia categorized countries manually. In order to make this classif
> ication fit in this do-file, Max deduces the countryspecifics from the .dta an
> d merges it with this dataset.
> */
. import excel "$xls\OECD_LDC_G77_OIL_RESS", sheet("Tabelle1") firstrow case(low
> er) clear
(6 vars, 110 obs)

. 
. * Fuel Exporting
. lab var fuel_exporting "Fuel exporting country"

. label define fuel_exporting1 0 "Non fuel-exporting" 1 "Fuel-exporting", replac
> e

. label values fuel_exporting fuel_exporting1

. 
. * OECD
. lab var oecd "OECD"

. label define OECD1 0 "Not in OECD" 1 "In OECD", replace

. label values oecd OECD1

. 
. * LDC
. lab var ldc "LDC"

. label define LDC1 0 "No LDC" 1 "LDC", replace

. label values ldc LDC1

. 
. * Resource-rich
. lab var resource_rich "Resource-rich country"

. label define resource_rich1 0 "Non resource-rich" 1 "Resource-rich", replace

. label values resource_rich resource_rich1

. 
. * G77 group countries
. label var g77 "G77 member states at the UN"

. label define G771 0 "Non-G77" 1 "G77", replace

. label values g77  G771

. 
. save "$datapath\country-specifics.dta", replace
file C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delegates\4_Carbo
> n_Prices\STATA\DTA-FILES\country-specifics.dta saved

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. ** Income Levels (World Bank Reference)
. import excel "$xls\Historical_Income_Levels.xlsx", sheet("Country Analytical H
> istory") cellrange(A4:AK240) firstrow clear
(37 vars, 236 obs)

. 
. rename B country_home

. rename AJ income_level_orig

. keep country_home income_level_orig

. drop in 1/7
(7 observations deleted)

. drop in 228/229
(2 observations deleted)

. drop if country_home == ""
(2 observations deleted)

. 
. * Income Level
. gen income_level = .
(225 missing values generated)

. replace income_level = 1 if income_level_orig == "L"
(27 real changes made)

. replace income_level = 2 if income_level_orig == "LM"
(55 real changes made)

. replace income_level = 3 if income_level_orig == "UM"
(55 real changes made)

. replace income_level = 4 if income_level_orig == "H"
(80 real changes made)

. label var income_level "Classification 2020: Low<$1,045; 1,046<lower-middle<4,
> 095; 4,096<upper-middle<12,695; high>12,696"
note: label truncated to 80 characters

. label define income_levell 1 "Low" 2 "Low-middle" 3 "Upper-middle" 4 "High", r
> eplace

. label values income_level income_levell

. 
. gen low_income=.
(225 missing values generated)

. replace low_income=1 if income_level==1
(27 real changes made)

. replace low_income=0 if income_level!=1 & income_level!= .
(190 real changes made)

. label var low_income "Low income countries"

. label define low_income 0 "No low-income" 1 "low-income", replace

. label values low_income low_income

. 
. gen lower_middle_income=.
(225 missing values generated)

. replace lower_middle_income=1 if income_level==2
(55 real changes made)

. replace lower_middle_income=0 if income_level!= 2 & income_level!= .
(162 real changes made)

. label var lower_middle_income "Lower-middle income countries"

. label define lower_middle_income 0 "No lower-middle" 1 "lower-middle", replace

. label values lower_middle_income lower_middle_income

. 
. gen upper_middle_income=.
(225 missing values generated)

. replace upper_middle_income=1 if income_level==3
(55 real changes made)

. replace upper_middle_income=0 if income_level!= 3 & income_level!=. 
(162 real changes made)

. label var upper_middle_income "Upper-middle income countries"

. label define upper_middle_income 0 "No upper-middle" 1 "Upper-middle", replace

. label values upper_middle_income upper_middle_income

. 
. gen high_income=.
(225 missing values generated)

. replace high_income=1 if income_level==4
(80 real changes made)

. replace high_income=0 if income_level!= 4 & income_level!= .
(137 real changes made)

. label var high_income "High income countries"

. label define high_income 0 "No high-income" 1 "High-income", replace

. label values high_income high_income

. 
. * Unify country names
. replace country_home = "Congo" if country_home == "Congo, Rep."
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Democratic Republic of the Congo" if country_home == "
> Congo, Dem. Rep."
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Gambia" if country_home == "The Gambia"
(0 real changes made)

. replace country_home = "Egypt" if country_home == "Egypt, Arab Rep."
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Gambia" if country_home == "Gambia, The"
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Lao People's Democratic Republic" if country_home == "
> Lao PDR"
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Micronesia" if country_home == "Micronesia, Fed. Sts."
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Republic of Korea" if country_home == "Korea, Rep."
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Czechia" if country_home == "Czech Republic"
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Côte d’Ivoire" if country_home == "Cote d'Ivoire" | co
> untry_home == "Côte d'Ivoire"
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "United States of America" if country_home == "United S
> tates" 
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Viet Nam" if country_home == "Vietnam" 
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Kyrgyzstan" if country_home == "Kyrgyz Republic"
(1 real change made)

. 
. *---Save Income Levels---*
. save "$datapath\income_level.dta", replace
file C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delegates\4_Carbo
> n_Prices\STATA\DTA-FILES\income_level.dta saved

. 
.

. 
. 
. ** Delegation-Country (from the COP-Report)
. import excel "C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delega
> tes\4_Carbon_Prices\STATA\XLS-FILES\delegates_ctry_orga.xlsx", sheet("Sheet1")
>  firstrow case(lower) clear
(6 vars, 276 obs)

. rename country country_delegation 

. lab var country_delegation  "Delegation for which participant has been at COP"

. keep firstname lastname country_delegation 

. 
. *---Save Delegation ---*
. save "$datapath\delegation.dta", replace
file C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delegates\4_Carbo
> n_Prices\STATA\DTA-FILES\delegation.dta saved

. // MERGE
. use  "$datapath\delegates_clean2.dta", clear

. 
. *WDI
. merge m:1 country_home using "$datapath\WDI.dta" // 
(note: variable country_home was str32, now str52 to accommodate using data's
       values)

    Result                           # of obs.
    -----------------------------------------
    not matched                           156
        from master                         0  (_merge==1)
        from using                        156  (_merge==2)

    matched                               277  (_merge==3)
    -----------------------------------------

. *ed country_home _merge if _merge == 1
. drop if _merge == 2
(156 observations deleted)

. drop _merge

. sum gdp gdppc gdp_growth co2_emissionpc population 

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
         gdp |        277    5.49e+11    1.91e+12   3.25e+08   1.91e+13
       gdppc |        277    13773.67    24223.47   289.2979   170379.2
  gdp_growth |        276    3.281068    2.540942   -7.16189   10.02113
co2_emissi~c |        276     3.16996    3.705128   .0295574   21.25095
  population |        277    4.63e+07    1.02e+08    37772.6   1.39e+09

.

. * Program Setup
. *--------------------------------------------------
. clear all               

. *version 16              // Set Version number for backward compatibility
. set more off            

. set linesize 80         

. macro drop _all        

. set matsize 2000
set matsize ignored.
    Matrix sizes are no longer limited by c(matsize) in modern Statas.  Matrix
    sizes are now limited by flavor of Stata.  See limits for more details.

. * -------------------------------------------------
. 
. 
. *--------------------------------------------------
. * Directory
. *--------------------------------------------------
. 
. * Max (G-Drive)
. global stata "C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delega
> tes\4_Carbon_Prices\STATA"

. global workpath   "$stata\DO-FILES"

. global datapath   "$stata\DTA-FILES"

. global output     "$stata\OUTPUT"

. global xls        "$stata\XLS-FILES"

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
.

. *--------------------------------------------------
. * Description
. *--------------------------------------------------
. /*
> I) Importing files
> II) Appending files to one dataset
> III) Cleaning
>         i) Renaming & Encoding
> IV) Unifying country-names and assigning to continents
> V) Merge country-specifics
> */
. *--------------------------------------------------
. 
.

. *--------
. * I. Importing files
. *-------------
. *** Treatment 1: Environment
. ** Own delegation
. import excel "$xls\Ecological-Own delegation.xlsx", firstrow case(lower) clear
(115 vars, 69 obs)

. 
. gen t_env=1

. label variable t_env "Primed on environmetnal caution (1) compared to techn. o
> pt. (0)"

. label define treatment_env 1 "Envir. caut" 0 "Tech. Opt"

. label values t_env treatment_env

. 
. gen t_own_delegation=1

. label variable t_own_delegation "Asked on own delegation (1) or others delegat
> ion (0)"

. label define treatment_delegation 1 "Own delegation" 0 "Other delegation"

. label values t_own_delegation treatment_delegation

. 
. save "$datapath\delegates_ecol_own.dta", replace
file C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delegates\4_Carbo
> n_Prices\STATA\DTA-FILES\delegates_ecol_own.dta saved

. 
. 
. 
. 
. ** Others delegation
. import excel "$xls\Ecological-Other delegation.xlsx", firstrow case(lower) cle
> ar
(115 vars, 60 obs)

. 
. gen t_env=1

. label variable t_env "Primed on ecological (1) or economic (0) consequences"

. label define treatment_env 1 "Ecologic" 0 "Economic"

. label values t_env treatment_env

. 
. gen t_own_delegation=0

. label variable t_own_delegation "Asked on own delegation (1) or others delegat
> ion (0)"

. label define treatment_delegation 1 "Own delegation" 0 "Other delegation"

. label values t_own_delegation treatment_delegation

. 
. save "$datapath\delegates_ecol_others.dta", replace
file C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delegates\4_Carbo
> n_Prices\STATA\DTA-FILES\delegates_ecol_others.dta saved

. 
.

. *------------
. * II. Appending & merging
. *--------------------
. use "$datapath\delegates_ecol_own.dta", clear

. append using "$datapath\delegates_ecol_others.dta", force
(note: variable a3sq002 was str15, now str17 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable b4sq004 was str15, now str17 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd14sq001_sq001 was str21, now str32 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd14sq002_sq001 was str18, now str29 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd6sq004 was str2, now str3 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd6sq006 was str2, now str3 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd6other was str44, now str168 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable lastname was str16, now str30 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(label treatment_delegation already defined)
(label treatment_env already defined)

. append using "$datapath\delegates_econ_own.dta", force
(note: variable a3sq003 was str15, now str17 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable ta1sq0031 was str18, now str19 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd1other was str86, now str103 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd3other was str50, now str62 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd571057comment was str53, now str98 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd571058comment was str36, now str41 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd5othercomment was str34, now str60 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(label treatment_delegation already defined)
(label treatment_env already defined)

. append using "$datapath\delegates_econ_others.dta", force
(note: variable sd1 was str6, now str17 to accommodate using data's values)
(note: variable sd14sq002_sq001 was str29, now str32 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd5sq001comment was str69, now str105 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd5othercomment was str60, now str81 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(label treatment_delegation already defined)
(label treatment_env already defined)

. 
. 
. 
. 
. *----------
. * III. Cleaning
. *----------------
. /*
> Three participants answered the survey twice; same e-mail adress twice in data
> set. For each couple, same name&lastname:
> 
> Date            firstname                               lastname              
>   email

. ** veryimportant => very important; somewhatunimportant => somewhat unimportan
> t
. foreach var in ta1sq0011 ta1sq0021 ta1sq0031 ta1sq0041 ta1sq0051 {
  2. replace `var'="Very important" if `var'=="Veryimportant"
  3. replace `var'="Somewhat unimportant" if `var'== "Somewhatunimportant"
  4. replace `var'="Not important at all" if `var'== "Notimportant at all"
  5. }

. ** Organizaton working for
. foreach var in sd6sq001 sd6sq002 sd6sq003 sd6sq004 sd6sq005 sd6sq006 {
  2. encode `var', gen(`var'_enc) label(yes_no)
  3. }

. 
. gen organization=.
(277 missing values generated)

. replace organization=1 if sd6sq001_enc==1
(22 real changes made)

. replace organization=2 if sd6sq002_enc==1
(195 real changes made)

. replace organization=3 if sd6sq003_enc==1
(47 real changes made)

. replace organization=4 if sd6sq004_enc==1
(11 real changes made)

. replace organization=5 if sd6sq005_enc==1
(30 real changes made)

. replace organization=6 if sd6sq006_enc==1
(7 real changes made)

. replace organization=7 if sd6other!=""
(26 real changes made)

. label define orga 1 "Internat. Gov. Organization" 2 "Nat. Gov. Organization" 3
>  "University/Research Institute" 4 "Private Company" 5 "Environmental NGO" 6 "
> Non-Environmental NGO" 7 "Other"

. label values organization orga

. label variable organization "Type of organization currently working for"

. 
. rename sd6other organization_other

. label variable organization_other "Other"

. 
. ** Agreement with other delegates
. encode  sd9, gen(agreement) label(extent2)

. lab var agreement "Agreement within delegation"

. 
. ** COPs attended
. rename sd7sq001_sq001 cops_attended

. 
. ** Whats your influence?
. label define influential1 1 "Not influential" 2 "Somewhat influential" 3 "Very
>  influential" 99 "Don’t know"

. encode sd8 , gen(influence) lab(influential1)

. label var influence "How influential do you see yourself inside your delegatio
> n the last COP?"

. 
. ** Book recommendation
. replace sd10="Good Economics for Hard Times" if sd10=="Good Economics for Hard
>  Times by Abhijit V. Banerjee and Esther DufloIt shows how economics, when don
> e right, can help us solve the thorniest social and political problems of our 
> day. We have the resources to address the challenges we face but we are so oft
> en blinded by ideology."
(113 real changes made)

. replace sd10="More from Less" if sd10=="More from Less by Andrew McAffeeIt arg
> ues that we don’t need to make radical changes to solve our ecological problem
> s. Instead, we need to do more of what we are already doing: growing technolog
> ically sophisticated market-based economies around the world."
(80 real changes made)

. replace sd10="Doughnut Economics" if sd10=="Doughnut Economics by Kate Rawarth
>  It points out how we can break our addiction to growth; redesign finance and 
> business to be in service to people; and create economies that are regenerativ
> e and distributive by design."
(84 real changes made)

. 
. label define book 1 "Good Economics for Hard Times" 2 "More from Less" 3 "Doug
> hnut Economics"

. encode sd10, gen(book) label(book)

. lab var book "Book recommendation for delegation"

. 
. * Book-Dummies
. gen book1=.
(277 missing values generated)

. replace book1 = 1 if book==1
(113 real changes made)

. replace book1 = 0 if book==2 | book==3
(164 real changes made)

. label var book1 "Good Economics for Hard Times, dealing with current critical 
> economic problems"

. 
. gen book2 = .
(277 missing values generated)

. replace book2 = 1 if book==2
(80 real changes made)

. replace book2 = 0 if book==1 | book==3
(197 real changes made)

. label var book2 "More from less, a new reason for optimism"

. 
. gen book3 =.
(277 missing values generated)

. replace book3  = 1 if book==3
(84 real changes made)

. replace book3  = 0 if book==1 | book==2
(193 real changes made)

. label var book3  "Doughnut Economics, Economics is broken- necessity of humani
> ty to fix the planet"

. 
. * Treatment
. gen treat_tech = (t_env - 1) *(-1)

. lab var treat_tech "Technological optimism made salient (compared to env. caut
> ion)"

. lab define tech_opt 0 "Env. caution" 1 "Techn. optimism"

. lab val treat_tech tech_opt

. * Program Setup

. clear all               

. *version 16              // Set Version number for backward compatibility
. set more off            

. set linesize 80         

. macro drop _all        

. set matsize 2000
set matsize ignored.
    Matrix sizes are no longer limited by c(matsize) in modern Statas.  Matrix
    sizes are now limited by flavor of Stata.  See limits for more details.

. * -------------------------------------------------
.

. *--------------------------------------------------
. * Directory
. *--------------------------------------------------
. 
. * Max (G-Drive)
. global stata "C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delega
> tes\4_Carbon_Prices\STATA"

. global workpath   "$stata\DO-FILES"

. global datapath   "$stata\DTA-FILES"

. global output     "$stata\OUTPUT"

. global xls        "$stata\XLS-FILES"

. 
. 
. 
.

. *--------------------------------------------------
. * Description
. *--------------------------------------------------
. /*
> I) Importing files
> II) Appending files to one dataset
> III) Cleaning
>         i) Renaming & Encoding
> IV) Unifying country-names and assigning to continents
> V) Merge country-specifics

. * I. Importing files

. *** Treatment 1: Environment
. ** Own delegation
. import excel "$xls\Ecological-Own delegation.xlsx", firstrow case(lower) clear
(115 vars, 69 obs)

. 
. gen t_env=1

. label variable t_env "Primed on environmetnal caution (1) compared to techn. o
> pt. (0)"

. label define treatment_env 1 "Envir. caut" 0 "Tech. Opt"

. label values t_env treatment_env

. 
. gen t_own_delegation=1

. label variable t_own_delegation "Asked on own delegation (1) or others delegat
> ion (0)"

. label define treatment_delegation 1 "Own delegation" 0 "Other delegation"

. label values t_own_delegation treatment_delegation

. 
. save "$datapath\delegates_ecol_own.dta", replace
file C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delegates\4_Carbo
> n_Prices\STATA\DTA-FILES\delegates_ecol_own.dta saved

. 
. 
. 
.

. import excel "$xls\Ecological-Other delegation.xlsx", firstrow case(lower) cle
> ar

> ion (0)"

       values)
(note: variable b4sq004 was str15, now str17 to accommodate using data's
       values)

       data's values)

       data's values)
(note: variable sd6sq004 was str2, now str3 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd6sq006 was str2, now str3 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd6other was str44, now str168 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable lastname was str16, now str30 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(label treatment_delegation already defined)
(label treatment_env already defined)

. append using "$datapath\delegates_econ_own.dta", force
(note: variable a3sq003 was str15, now str17 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable ta1sq0031 was str18, now str19 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd1other was str86, now str103 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd3other was str50, now str62 to accommodate using data's
       values)

       data's values)

       data's values)

       data's values)
(label treatment_delegation already defined)
(label treatment_env already defined)

(note: variable sd14sq002_sq001 was str29, now str32 to accommodate using
       data's values)

       data's values)

       data's values)

. *----------
. * III. Cleaning
. *----------------
. /*
> Three participants answered the survey twice; same e-mail adress twice in data
> set. For each couple, same name&lastname:
> 
> Date            firstname                               lastname              
>   email
> 04.11.2020      Ram Prasad                              Awasthi               
>   awasthiramprasad@gmail.com
> 16.02.2021      Ram                                             Awasthi       
>           awasthiramprasad@gmail.com
> 
> 02.12.2020      Nagla                                   Jebory                
>   nagla_fnc@yahoo.com
> 05.11.2020      Nagla Mahgoub Hamadain  Jebory                  nagla_fnc@yaho
> o.com
> 
> 06.11.2020      Augustin                                Ngenzirabona    augung
> enzi@yahoo.fr
> 25.03.2021      Ngenzirablna                    Augustin                augung
> enzi@yahoo.fr
> 
> Keep first entry of each
> */
. drop if firstname == "Ram" & lastname == "Awasthi"
(1 observation deleted)

. drop if firstname == "Nagla Mahgoub Hamadain" & lastname == "Jebory"
(1 observation deleted)

. drop if firstname == "Ngenzirablna" & lastname == "Augustin"
(1 observation deleted)

. 
. 
. 
. 
.

. gen id = _n

. lab var id "ID"

  3. replace `var'="Somewhat unimportant" if `var'== "Somewhatunimportant"
  4. replace `var'="Not important at all" if `var'== "Notimportant at all"
  5. }

. *** Article 6 and Carbon Markets
. ** Question 1

. label define consider1 1 "No, probably way too low" 2 "No, probably way too hi
> gh" 3 "Yes, I do" 99 "Don’t know"

. encode b2 , gen(question_b2) label(consider1)

. lab var question_b2 "Do you consider these estimates to be realistic?"

. lab def conti 1 "Africa" 2 "Asia" 3 "Europe" 4 "North America" 5 "South Americ
> a" 6 "Oceania", replace

. encode continent, gen(continent2) lab(conti)

. drop continent

. rename continent2 continent

. lab var continent "Continent"

> ty topics"

> c_social == 0 & educ_social_nat == 0 & educ_engin == 0 & educ_other == 0

> er"

. *--------------
. * IV) Merge country-specifics
. *--------------
. 
. // World development indices
. *import excel "$xls\WDI_Indexes_average 2015-2019", sheet("Sheet1") firstrow c
> ase(lower) clear
. 
. import excel "$xls\Data_Extract_From_World_Development_Indicators", sheet("Dat
> a") firstrow case(lower) clear
(9 vars, 1,601 obs)

. foreach var in yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019 {
  2. replace `var' = "." if `var' == ".."
  3. }
(325 real changes made)
(333 real changes made)
(333 real changes made)
(336 real changes made)
(581 real changes made)

. destring yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019, replace
yr2015: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(330 missing values generated)
yr2016: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(338 missing values generated)
yr2017: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(338 missing values generated)
yr2018: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(341 missing values generated)
yr2019: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(586 missing values generated)

. encode countrycode, generate(country_code)

. egen average = rowmean(yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019)
(329 missing values generated)

. keep countryname average seriesname

. drop if countryname == ""
(3 observations deleted)

. 
. * Reshape to wide
. egen indicator = group(seriesname)
(2 missing values generated)

. drop if indicator == . // Datasource information
(2 observations deleted)

. 
. /* 
> 1: CO2 emissions (metric tons per capita)       
> 2: Droughts, floods, extreme temperatures (% of population, average 1990-2009)
> 3: GDP (constant 2015 US$); 
> 4: GDP growth (annual %)
> 5: GDP per capita (constant 2015 US$)
> 6: Population, total
> */
. 
. drop seriesname 

. encode countryname , gen(country_code)

. reshape wide average , i(country_code) j(indicator)
(note: j = 1 2 3 4 5 6)

Data                               long   ->   wide
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Number of obs.                     1596   ->     266
Number of variables                   4   ->       8
j variable (6 values)         indicator   ->   (dropped)
xij variables:
                                average   ->   average1 average2 ... average6
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Unify variable names
. rename countryname country_home

. label var country_home "Home country"

. drop country_code

. order country_home

. 
. rename average1 co2_emissionpc

. label var co2_emissionpc "CO2 emissions (metric tons per capita)"

. 
. drop average2 // no values for countries in dataset

. 
. rename average3 gdp

. label var gdp "GDP (constant 2015 US$)"

. 
. rename average4 gdp_growth

. label var gdp_growth "GDP growth (annual %)"

. 
. rename average5 gdppc

. label var gdppc "GDP per capita (constant 2015 US$)"

. 
. rename average6 population

. label var population "Population, total"

. 
. 
. 
. * Unify country names
. replace country_home = "Congo" if country_home == "Congo, Rep."
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Czechia" if country_home == "Czech Republic"
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Democratic Republic of the Congo" if country_home == "
> Congo, Dem. Rep."
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Egypt" if country_home == "Egypt, Arab Rep."
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Côte d’Ivoire" if country_home == "Cote d'Ivoire" | co
> untry_home == "Côte d'Ivoire"
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Republic of Korea" if country_home == "Korea, Rep."
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Lao People's Democratic Republic" if country_home == "
> Lao PDR"
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Micronesia" if country_home == "Micronesia, Fed. Sts."
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "United States of America" if country_home == "United S
> tates" 
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Viet Nam" if country_home == "Vietnam" 
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Gambia" if country_home == "Gambia, The"
(1 real change made)

. replace country_home = "Kyrgyzstan" if country_home == "Kyrgyz Republic"
(1 real change made)

. 
.

. // World Government-Indices
. import excel "$xls\Data_Extract_From_Worldwide_Governance_Indicators", sheet("
> Data") firstrow case(lower) clear
(9 vars, 861 obs)

. foreach var in yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019 {
  2. replace `var' = "." if `var' == ".."
  3. }
(25 real changes made)
(25 real changes made)
(25 real changes made)
(21 real changes made)
(21 real changes made)

. destring yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019, replace
yr2015: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(30 missing values generated)
yr2016: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(30 missing values generated)
yr2017: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(30 missing values generated)
yr2018: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(26 missing values generated)
yr2019: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(26 missing values generated)

. encode countrycode, generate(country_code)

. egen average = rowmean(yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019)
(26 missing values generated)

. keep countryname average seriesname

. drop if countryname == ""
(3 observations deleted)

. 
. * Reshape to wide
. bysort countryname: gen indicator = _n // 1: Control of Corruption: Estimate; 
> 2: Government Effectiveness: Estimate; 3: Regulatory Quality: Estimate; 4: Voi
> ce and Accountability: Estimate

. 
. drop seriesname

. encode countryname , gen(country_code)

. reshape wide average , i(country_code) j(indicator)
(note: j = 1 2 3 4)

Data                               long   ->   wide
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Number of obs.                      858   ->     216
Number of variables                   4   ->       6
j variable (4 values)         indicator   ->   (dropped)
xij variables:
                                average   ->   average1 average2 ... average4
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Unify variable names
. rename countryname country_home

. label var country_home "Home country"

. drop country_code

. order country_home

. 
. rename average1 control_corr 

. lab var control_corr "Control of Corruption: Estimate [CC.EST]" 

. 
. rename average2 gov_effect

. lab var gov_effect "Government Effectiveness: Estimate [GE.EST]"

. 
. rename average3 regul_quality

. lab var regul_quality "Regulatory Quality: Estimate [RQ.EST]"

. 
. rename average4 accountability

. lab var accountability "Voice and Accountability: Estimate [VA.EST]"

. 
. keep country_home control_corr gov_effect regul_quality accountability

.

. ** Keep & Order
. * Keep
. keep  ///
> /*Added vars*/ treat_tech t_env t_own_delegation ///
> /* Socio-Demographics*/ id country_delegation country_home country_citizen con
> tinent gender female birth_yr age info_cc_1 info_cc_2 info_cc_3 info_cc_4 info
> _cc_5 influential_1 influential_2 influential_3 influential_4 influential_5 in
> fluential_6 organization edu edu_specify ///
> /*Output Vars*/ temp_rise carbon_price accecpt_global_carbon accept_gdp_reduce
>   price_home_now price_oecd_now price_ldc_now price_home_future price_oecd_fut
> ure price_ldc_future glob_nat_interest ///
> /*Mindset: Environmental Mindset*/ env_ms_1 env_ms_2 env_ms_3 env_ms_4 env_ms_
> 5 env_ms_1_read env_ms_2_read env_ms_3_read env_ms_4_read env_ms_5_read env_sh
> ared_oppinion env_know  ///
> /*Mindset: Economic Mindset*/ tech_ms_1 tech_ms_2 tech_ms_3 tech_ms_4 tech_ms_
> 5 tech_ms_6 tech_ms_1_read tech_ms_2_read tech_ms_3_read tech_ms_4_read tech_m
> s_5_read tech_ms_6_read econ_shared_oppinion econ_know ///
> /*Others*/ agreement cops_attended influence book book1 book2 book3 ///

>  lower_middle_income upper_middle_income high_income control_corr gov_effect r
> egul_quality accountability fuel_exporting resource_rich g77 comment

. *--------------------------------------------------
. * Program Setup
. *--------------------------------------------------
. clear all               

. *version 16              // Set Version number for backward compatibility
. set more off            

. set linesize 80         

. macro drop _all        

. set matsize 2000
set matsize ignored.
    Matrix sizes are no longer limited by c(matsize) in modern Statas.  Matrix
    sizes are now limited by flavor of Stata.  See limits for more details.

. * -------------------------------------------------
. 
. 
. *--------------------------------------------------
. * Directory
. *--------------------------------------------------
. 
. * Max (G-Drive)
. global stata "C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delega
> tes\4_Carbon_Prices\STATA"

. global workpath   "$stata\DO-FILES"

. global datapath   "$stata\DTA-FILES"

. global output     "$stata\OUTPUT"

. global xls        "$stata\XLS-FILES"

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. *--------------------------------------------------
. * Description
. *--------------------------------------------------
. /*
> I) Importing files
> II) Appending files to one dataset
> III) Cleaning
>         i) Renaming & Encoding
> IV) Unifying country-names and assigning to continents
> V) Merge country-specifics
> */
. *--------------------------------------------------
.

. *--------
. * I. Importing files
. *-------------
. *** Treatment 1: Environment
. ** Own delegation
. import excel "$xls\Ecological-Own delegation.xlsx", firstrow case(lower) clear
(115 vars, 69 obs)

. 
. gen t_env=1

. label variable t_env "Primed on environmetnal caution (1) compared to techn. o
> pt. (0)"

. label define treatment_env 1 "Envir. caut" 0 "Tech. Opt"

. label values t_env treatment_env

. 
. gen t_own_delegation=1

. label variable t_own_delegation "Asked on own delegation (1) or others delegat
> ion (0)"

. label define treatment_delegation 1 "Own delegation" 0 "Other delegation"

. label values t_own_delegation treatment_delegation

. 
. save "$datapath\delegates_ecol_own.dta", replace
(note: file C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delegates\
> 4_Carbon_Prices\STATA\DTA-FILES\delegates_ecol_own.dta not found)
file C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delegates\4_Carbo
> n_Prices\STATA\DTA-FILES\delegates_ecol_own.dta saved

. 
. 
. 
. 
. ** Others delegation
. import excel "$xls\Ecological-Other delegation.xlsx", firstrow case(lower) cle
> ar
(115 vars, 60 obs)

. 
. gen t_env=1

. label variable t_env "Primed on ecological (1) or economic (0) consequences"

. label define treatment_env 1 "Ecologic" 0 "Economic"

. label values t_env treatment_env

. 
. gen t_own_delegation=0

. label variable t_own_delegation "Asked on own delegation (1) or others delegat
> ion (0)"

. label define treatment_delegation 1 "Own delegation" 0 "Other delegation"

. label values t_own_delegation treatment_delegation

. 
. save "$datapath\delegates_ecol_others.dta", replace
(note: file C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delegates\

file C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delegates\4_Carbo
> n_Prices\STATA\DTA-FILES\delegates_ecol_others.dta saved

. * II. Appending & merging
. *--------------------
. use "$datapath\delegates_ecol_own.dta", clear

. append using "$datapath\delegates_ecol_others.dta", force
(note: variable a3sq002 was str15, now str17 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable b4sq004 was str15, now str17 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd14sq001_sq001 was str21, now str32 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd14sq002_sq001 was str18, now str29 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd6sq004 was str2, now str3 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd6sq006 was str2, now str3 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd6other was str44, now str168 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable lastname was str16, now str30 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(label treatment_delegation already defined)
(label treatment_env already defined)

. append using "$datapath\delegates_econ_own.dta", force
(note: variable a3sq003 was str15, now str17 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable ta1sq0031 was str18, now str19 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd1other was str86, now str103 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd3other was str50, now str62 to accommodate using data's
       values)
(note: variable sd571057comment was str53, now str98 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd571058comment was str36, now str41 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd5othercomment was str34, now str60 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(label treatment_delegation already defined)
(label treatment_env already defined)

. append using "$datapath\delegates_econ_others.dta", force
(note: variable sd1 was str6, now str17 to accommodate using data's values)
(note: variable sd14sq002_sq001 was str29, now str32 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd5sq001comment was str69, now str105 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(note: variable sd5othercomment was str60, now str81 to accommodate using
       data's values)
(label treatment_delegation already defined)
(label treatment_env already defined)

. 
. 
.

. *----------
. * III. Cleaning
. *----------------
. /*
> Three participants answered the survey twice; same e-mail adress twice in data
> set. For each couple, same name&lastname:
> 
> Date            firstname                               lastname              
>   email
> 04.11.2020      Ram Prasad                              Awasthi               
>   awasthiramprasad@gmail.com
> 16.02.2021      Ram                                             Awasthi       
>           awasthiramprasad@gmail.com
> 
> 02.12.2020      Nagla                                   Jebory                
>   nagla_fnc@yahoo.com
> 05.11.2020      Nagla Mahgoub Hamadain  Jebory                  nagla_fnc@yaho
> o.com
> 
> 06.11.2020      Augustin                                Ngenzirabona    augung
> enzi@yahoo.fr
> 25.03.2021      Ngenzirablna                    Augustin                augung
> enzi@yahoo.fr
> 
> Keep first entry of each
> */
. drop if firstname == "Ram" & lastname == "Awasthi"
(1 observation deleted)

. drop if firstname == "Nagla Mahgoub Hamadain" & lastname == "Jebory"
(1 observation deleted)

. drop if firstname == "Ngenzirablna" & lastname == "Augustin"
(1 observation deleted)

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. *** Generate ID
. gen id = _n

. lab var id "ID"

. 
. 
. *** i) Encoding
. ** veryimportant => very important; somewhatunimportant => somewhat unimportan
> t
. foreach var in ta1sq0011 ta1sq0021 ta1sq0031 ta1sq0041 ta1sq0051 {
  2. replace `var'="Very important" if `var'=="Veryimportant"
  3. replace `var'="Somewhat unimportant" if `var'== "Somewhatunimportant"
  4. replace `var'="Not important at all" if `var'== "Notimportant at all"
  5. }
(161 real changes made)
variable ta1sq0011 was str19 now str20
(4 real changes made)
(7 real changes made)
(219 real changes made)
variable ta1sq0021 was str19 now str20
(1 real change made)
(0 real changes made)
(190 real changes made)
variable ta1sq0031 was str19 now str20
(2 real changes made)
(0 real changes made)
(157 real changes made)
variable ta1sq0041 was str19 now str20
(8 real changes made)
(6 real changes made)
(144 real changes made)
variable ta1sq0051 was str19 now str20
(10 real changes made)
(4 real changes made)

. 
. ** Importance of environmental projection
. label define important 1 "Not important at all" 2 "Somewhat unimportant" 3 "Ne
> utral" 4 "Somewhat important" 5 "Very important"

. foreach var in ta1sq0011 ta1sq0021 ta1sq0031 ta1sq0041 ta1sq0051 {
  2. encode `var', gen(`var'_enc) label(important)
  3. }

. 
. rename ta1sq0011_enc env_ms_1

. label var env_ms_1 "Environmental events that historically happened once per c
> entury will occur at least once per year by 2050."
note: label truncated to 80 characters

>  many planetary boundaries that demand equal attention"

> untries or across borders by 2050"

>  limited population"

. rename ta1sq0051_enc env_ms_5

. label var env_ms_5 "Exponential economic growth cannot be sustained in a finit
> e system like our planet."
note: label truncated to 80 characters

. 
. label define yes_no 0 "No" 1 "Yes"

. foreach var in ta1sq0012 ta1sq0022 ta1sq0032 ta1sq0042 ta1sq0052 {
  2. encode `var', gen(`var'_enc) label(yes_no)
  3. }

> ion 1"

> ion 2"

> ion 5"

. 
. label define yes_no_idk 0 "No" 1 "Yes" 99 "Don’t know"

. replace ta2sq001="Don’t know" if ta2sq001=="Don't know"
variable ta2sq001 was str10 now str12
(128 real changes made)

. encode ta2sq001, gen(env_shared_oppinion) label (yes_no_idk)

> Environmental issues"

> ms_5_read

> _5_read"

. ** Outcome variables
. * Acceptable Degree temperature
. rename out1sq001 temp_rise 

. lab var temp_rise  "Acceptable increase in temperature until 2100 compared to 
> pre-industrial levels"

. 
. * Appropriate Carbon Price
. rename out2sq001_sq001 carbon_price

. lab var carbon_price "Appropriate price for carbon emissions (US$/t CO2) to st
> ay below temp_rise"

. 
. * Likelihood of major countries accepting global carbon price
. label define realistic 1 "Not realistic at all" 2 "Somewhat realistic" 3 "Very
>  realistic" 99 "Don’t know"

. encode out3, gen(accecpt_global_carbon) label (realistic)

. lab var accecpt_global_carbon "Likelihood that all major countries accet globa
> l carbon price until 2050"

.

> 080 to 2100 countries to keep temeprature below 2°C"

. lab var price_ldc_future "LCDs: Appropriate price for carbon emissions from 20
> 80 to 2100 to keep temeprature below 2°C"
note: label truncated to 80 characters

. 
. * Global interests vs. national interests
. label define extent1 1 "No, not at all" 2 "Yes, to some extent" 3 "Yes, to a g
> reat extent" 99 "Don’t know"

. lab var glob_nat_interest "Prioritize global over national interests"

. 
. * Acceptable average GDP reduction
. label define acceptable_gdp 1 "GDP reduction is not acceptable" 2 "0-0.5% GDP 
> reduction" 3 "0.5-1% GDP reduction" 4 "1-1.5% GDP reduction" 5 "1.5-2% GDP red
> uction" 6 "2% or more GDP reduction"

. encode out6, gen(accept_gdp_reduce) label(acceptable_gdp)

. lab var accept_gdp_reduce "Acceptable average GDP reduction in home country du
> e to climate policies in next 10 years"
note: label truncated to 80 characters

.

. *** NDCs and Ratchet Mechanism
. ** Question 1
. foreach var in a1sq001 a1sq002 a1sq003 {
  2. replace `var'="Somewhat better" if `var'=="Somewhatbetter"
  3. }
variable a1sq001 was str14 now str15
(95 real changes made)
variable a1sq002 was str14 now str15
(100 real changes made)
variable a1sq003 was str14 now str15
(94 real changes made)

. 
. label define better 1 "Much worse" 2 "Somewhat worse" 3 "About the same" 4 "So
> mewhat better" 5 "Much better" 99 "Don’t know"

. 
. foreach var in a1sq001 a1sq002 a1sq003 {
  2. encode `var', gen(`var'_enc) label (better)
  3. }

. rename a1sq001_enc question1_1

. lab var question1_1 "For attracting broad participation in climate agreements"

. rename a1sq002_enc question1_2

. lab var question1_2 "For achieving the long-term target of limiting warming to
>  well below 2°C above pre-industrial levels"
note: label truncated to 80 characters

. rename a1sq003_enc question1_3

. lab var question1_3 "For implementing the principle of common but differentiat
> ed responsibilities and respective capabilities (CBDR-RC)"
note: label truncated to 80 characters

. 
. ** Question 2
. label define parties 1 "No Party" 2 "A few Parties" 3 "All or most Parties" 99
>  "Don’t know"

. foreach var in a2sq001 a2sq003 a2sq004 a2sq005 a2sq007 a2sq008  {
  2. encode `var', gen(`var'_enc) label (parties)
  3. }

. rename a2sq001_enc question2_1

. lab var question2_1 "High costs of reducing GHG emissions"

. rename a2sq003_enc question2_2

. lab var question2_2 "Costs associated with more ambitious NDCs would exceed lo
> cal co-benefit"

. rename a2sq004_enc question2_3

. lab var question2_3 "Unsolved climate finance issues"

. rename a2sq005_enc question2_4

. lab var question2_4 "Fear that other countries may benefit from own climate ef
> forts without contributing sufficiently themselves (free-riding)"
note: label truncated to 80 characters

. rename a2sq007_enc question2_5

. lab var question2_5 "Open issues under Article 6 concerning cooperative approa
> ches and carbon market mechanism"
note: label truncated to 80 characters

. rename a2sq008_enc question2_6

. lab var question2_6 "Attribution of responsibility for climate action to other
>  Parties"

. 
. 
. ** Question 3
. label define useful 1 "Not useful at all" 2 "Not very useful" 3 "Somewhat usef
> ul" 4 "Very useful" 99 "Don’t know"

. foreach var in a3sq002 a3sq003 a3sq004 a3sq005  {
  2. encode `var', gen(`var'_enc) label (useful)
  3. }

. 
. rename a3sq002_enc question3_1

. label var question3_1 "For achieving the long-term target of limiting warming 
> to well below 2°C above pre-industrial levels"
note: label truncated to 80 characters

. rename a3sq003_enc question3_2

. label var question3_2 "For accelerating global GHG emission reductions over ti
> me"

. rename a3sq004_enc question3_3

. label var question3_3 "For achieving a fair burden sharing"

. rename a3sq005_enc question3_4

. label var question3_4 "or incentivizing the highest possible ambition in first
> -round NDCs"

. 
. 
. ** Question 4
. label define likely 1 "No, not likely" 2 "Yes, somewhat likely" 3 "Yes, very l
> ikely" 99 "Don’t know"

. lab def conti 1 "Africa" 2 "Asia" 3 "Europe" 4 "North America" 5 "South Americ
> a" 6 "Oceania", replace

. rename continent2 continent

. lab var continent "Continent"

> estion5_2 question5_3 question5_4 question5_5 question5_6 question5_7 question
> 5_8 question6 question7 question_b1 question_b2 question_b3 question_b4_1 ques
> tion_b4_2 question_b4_3 question_b4_4  {

  3. }

. /* Classification of Education [Answers loaded into excel and re-imported]

> .xlsx", sheet("Tabelle1") firstrow clear

> /*

> 
> rename Agriculture edu_agri
> lab var edu_agri "Agricultural education"
> rename Biology edu_bio
> lab var edu_bio "Biological education"

> lab var edu_cli_env "Climate/Environmental science education"
> rename EconomicsBusiness edu_econ_bus
> lab var edu_econ_bus "Economic/business education"
> rename Developmentstudies edu_development
> lab var edu_development "Development studies education"
> rename Engineering edu_engineering
> lab var edu_engineering "Engineering education"
> rename Law edu_law
> lab var edu_law "Law"
> rename Other edu_other_specification
> lab var edu_other_specification "Other education"

> ngineering {

> }

> env == 0 & edu_econ_bus == 0 & edu_development == 0 & edu_engineering == 0
> replace edu_other_specification = 0 if edu_agri != 0 | edu_bio != 0 | edu_cli_
> env != 0 | edu_econ_bus != 0 | edu_development != 0 | edu_engineering != 0
> 
> */

> lab var educ_nat "Natural science educcation"

> lab var educ_econ "Economics/business educcation"

> lab var educ_law "Law educcation"

> lab var educ_social "Social science educcation (other than econ/busin)"

> lab var educ_social_nat "Social & nautral sciences educcation"

> lab var educ_engin "Engineering educcation"

> lab var educ_other "Other edcuation"

> lab var env_cli_sust "Education related to enviornmental/climatic/sustainabili
> ty topics"
> 
> foreach var in educ_nat educ_econ educ_law educ_social educ_social_nat educ_en
> gin educ_other env_cli_sust {
> replace `var'= 0 if `var'== .
> }
> 
> replace educ_other = 1 if educ_nat == 0 & educ_econ == 0 & educ_law == 0 & edu
> c_social == 0 & educ_social_nat == 0 & educ_engin == 0 & educ_other == 0
> replace educ_other = 0 if educ_nat != 0 | educ_econ != 0 | educ_law != 0 | edu
> c_social != 0 | educ_social_nat != 0 | educ_engin != 0 | educ_other != 0
> 
> gen educ_type = .
> replace educ_type = 1 if educ_nat == 1
> replace educ_type = 2 if educ_econ == 1 
> replace educ_type = 3 if educ_social == 1
> replace educ_type = 4 if educ_social_nat == 1
> replace educ_type = 5 if educ_law == 1
> replace educ_type = 6 if educ_engin == 1
> replace educ_type = 7 if educ_other == 1
> lab var educ_type "Education type"
> lab define educ_type1 1 "Natural sciences" 2 "Economics/Business" 3 "Other soc
> ial sciences" 4 "Mix social & natural sciences" 5 "Law" 6 "Engineering" 7 "Oth
> er"
> lab val educ_type educ_type1
> 
> 
> keep id edu_specify educ_type educ_nat educ_econ educ_law educ_social educ_soc
> ial_nat educ_engin educ_other env_cli_sust
> 
> save "$datapath\edu_classification.dta", replace
> 
> 
> 
> 
> * Merge
> use "$datapath\delegates_clean1.dta", clear
> merge 1:1 id using "$datapath\edu_classification.dta", force
> 
> drop if _merge == 2 // doubles deleted
> drop _merge
> */
.

. *--------------
. * IV) Merge country-specifics
. *--------------
. 
. // World development indices
. *import excel "$xls\WDI_Indexes_average 2015-2019", sheet("Sheet1") firstrow c
> ase(lower) clear
. 
. import excel "$xls\Data_Extract_From_World_Development_Indicators", sheet("Dat
> a") firstrow case(lower) clear
(9 vars, 1,601 obs)

. foreach var in yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019 {
  2. replace `var' = "." if `var' == ".."
  3. }
(325 real changes made)
(333 real changes made)
(333 real changes made)
(336 real changes made)
(581 real changes made)

. destring yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019, replace
yr2015: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(330 missing values generated)
yr2016: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(338 missing values generated)
yr2017: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(338 missing values generated)
yr2018: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(341 missing values generated)
yr2019: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(586 missing values generated)

. encode countrycode, generate(country_code)

. egen average = rowmean(yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019)
(329 missing values generated)

. keep countryname average seriesname

. drop if countryname == ""
(3 observations deleted)

. 
. * Reshape to wide
. egen indicator = group(seriesname)
(2 missing values generated)

. drop if indicator == . // Datasource information
(2 observations deleted)

. 
. /* 
> 1: CO2 emissions (metric tons per capita)       
> 2: Droughts, floods, extreme temperatures (% of population, average 1990-2009)
> 3: GDP (constant 2015 US$); 
> 4: GDP growth (annual %)
> 5: GDP per capita (constant 2015 US$)
> 6: Population, total
> */
. 
. drop seriesname 

. encode countryname , gen(country_code)

. reshape wide average , i(country_code) j(indicator)
(note: j = 1 2 3 4 5 6)

Data                               long   ->   wide
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Number of obs.                     1596   ->     266
Number of variables                   4   ->       8
j variable (6 values)         indicator   ->   (dropped)
xij variables:
                                average   ->   average1 average2 ... average6
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

. 
. * Unify variable names
. rename countryname country_home

. label var country_home "Home country"

. drop country_code

. order country_home

. 
. rename average1 co2_emissionpc

. // World Government-Indices
. import excel "$xls\Data_Extract_From_Worldwide_Governance_Indicators", sheet("
> Data") firstrow case(lower) clear
(9 vars, 861 obs)

. foreach var in yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019 {
  2. replace `var' = "." if `var' == ".."
  3. }
(25 real changes made)
(25 real changes made)
(25 real changes made)
(21 real changes made)
(21 real changes made)

. destring yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019, replace
yr2015: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(30 missing values generated)
yr2016: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(30 missing values generated)
yr2017: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(30 missing values generated)
yr2018: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(26 missing values generated)
yr2019: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(26 missing values generated)

. encode countrycode, generate(country_code)

. egen average = rowmean(yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019)
(26 missing values generated)

. keep countryname average seriesname

. drop if countryname == ""
(3 observations deleted)

. 
. * Reshape to wide
. bysort countryname: gen indicator = _n // 1: Control of Corruption: Estimate; 
> 2: Government Effectiveness: Estimate; 3: Regulatory Quality: Estimate; 4: Voi
> ce and Accountability: Estimate

. 
. drop seriesname

. encode countryname , gen(country_code)

. reshape wide average , i(country_code) j(indicator)
(note: j = 1 2 3 4)

Data                               long   ->   wide
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Number of obs.                      858   ->     216
Number of variables                   4   ->       6
j variable (4 values)         indicator   ->   (dropped)
xij variables:
                                average   ->   average1 average2 ... average4
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

.

. rename countryname country_home

  low_income |        277    .1805054     .385304          0          1
lower_midd~e |        277    .3718412     .484171          0          1
upper_midd~e |        277    .2021661    .4023423          0          1
 high_income |        277    .2454874    .4311547          0          1

. drop _merge

. 
. * Delegation
. merge m:1 firstname lastname using "$datapath\delegation.dta" // 

    Result                           # of obs.
    -----------------------------------------
    not matched                             1
        from master                         1  (_merge==1)
        from using                          0  (_merge==2)

    matched                               276  (_merge==3)
    -----------------------------------------

. *ed country_home _merge if _merge == 1
. drop if _merge == 2
(0 observations deleted)

. drop _merge

. 
. 
.

. // Sociodemographics
. * Education
. tab edu, generate(edu)

. * Organization currently working for
. gen orga = .
(277 missing values generated)

. replace orga = 1 if organization == 1 | organization == 2 // International (11
> ) & national (168) gov orga 
(179 real changes made)

. replace orga = 2 if organization == 3 //  University/Research Institute
(33 real changes made)

. replace orga = 3 if organization == 5 //  Environmental NGO
(25 real changes made)

. replace orga = 4 if organization == 4 |  organization == 6 |  organization == 
> 7 //  Private Company (n=8), Non-environmental NGO (n=6), Other (n=26)
(40 real changes made)

. tab organization

> tute" 3 "Environmental NGO" 4 "Other"

. // Temperature rise deemed acceptable
. ** Temperature above 1.5 degrees
. gen temp_above = .
(277 missing values generated)

. replace temp_above = 0 if temp_rise <= 1.5
(216 real changes made)

. replace temp_above = 1 if temp_rise > 1.5
(61 real changes made)

. lab var temp_above "Temperature rise above 1.5°C deemed acceptable"

. 
. /*
> Very few people suggested temperatures of 2.5°C or higher to be acceptable:
> 2.5°C -> 9
> 3.0°C -> 4
> 3.5°C -> 2
> 4.0°C -> 2
> 4.5°C -> 0
> 5.0°C -> 4
> Therefore, for the illustration Figure 1a all temperature suggestions of 2.5°C
>  or more are summarized under >= 2.5°C
> */
. gen temp_rise2 = temp_rise

. replace temp_rise2 = 2.5 if temp_rise >= 2.5
(12 real changes made)

. tostring temp_rise2, gen(temp_rise3)
temp_rise3 generated as str3

. sort temp_rise

. lab define temp 1 "0" 2 ".5" 3 "1" 4 "1.5", replace

. encode temp_rise3, gen(temp_rise_cropped) lab(temp)

. lab var temp_rise_cropped"All those suggesting 2.5 or more collected in 2.5"

. drop temp_rise2 temp_rise3

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. // Global carbon price suggested
. ** Logarithmic form of suggested carbon prices
. gen ln_carbon_price = ln(carbon_price + 1)

. label var ln_carbon_price "Natural logarithm of suggested carbon_price"

. 
. ** Cropping carbon price suggested at 500 for visualization in figure 1a
. gen carbon_price_cap = carbon_price

. replace carbon_price_cap  = 501 if carbon_price > 500
(23 real changes made)

. egen mean_carbon_price = mean(carbon_price), by(temp_rise_cropped)

. egen median_carbon_price = median(carbon_price), by(temp_rise_cropped)

. tab temp_rise_cropped , gen(tr)

  All those |
 suggesting |
2.5 or more |
  collected |
     in 2.5 |      Freq.     Percent        Cum.
------------+-----------------------------------
          0 |         22        7.94        7.94
         .5 |         36       13.00       20.94
          1 |         42       15.16       36.10
        1.5 |        116       41.88       77.98
          2 |         40       14.44       92.42
        2.5 |         21        7.58      100.00
------------+-----------------------------------
      Total |        277      100.00

. 
. ** Price suggested below 60 USD
. gen price_below = .
(277 missing values generated)

. replace price_below = 0 if carbon_price >= 60 
(126 real changes made)

. replace price_below = 1 if carbon_price < 60 
(151 real changes made)

. lab var price_below "Price suggested < USD60"

. 
. /*
> Carbon price suggestions tested
> Different models suggest different minimal global carbon prices to stay below 
> a certain temperature rise. In the main paper we use USD60 as thte threshold. 
> As robustness test, we also test against other specifications: 82 USD, 185 USD
> , 281 USD
> */
. foreach i in 37 60 82 185 281 {
  2.         gen price_below_`i' = .
  3.                 replace price_below_`i'= 1 if carbon_price < `i'
  4.                 replace price_below_`i'= 0 if carbon_price >=  `i'
  5.         lab var price_below_`i' "Price below USD `i' suggested"
  6. }
(277 missing values generated)
(119 real changes made)
(158 real changes made)
(277 missing values generated)
(151 real changes made)
(126 real changes made)
(277 missing values generated)
(175 real changes made)
(102 real changes made)
(277 missing values generated)
(224 real changes made)
(53 real changes made)
(277 missing values generated)
(241 real changes made)
(36 real changes made)

. 
. ** Shifting
. // Other countries
. * To OECD
. gen shift_to_oecd = price_oecd_now - price_home_now 

. lab var shift_to_oecd "Shift to OECD Countries (if > 0 shift to others)" 

. * To LDCs
. gen shift_to_ldc = price_ldc_now - price_home_now 

. lab var shift_to_ldc "Shift to LD Countries (if > 0 shift to others)" 

. 
. * From LDC to OECD
. gen shift_ldc_oecd = price_oecd_now - price_ldc_now 

. lab var shift_ldc_oecd "Shift from LDC to OECD (if > 0 OECD-countries should p
> ay higher price)"

. 
. // Shifting responsibilties to the future
. * Home Country
. gen shift_future_home = price_home_future - price_home_now 

. lab var shift_future_home "Shift to future: Home (if>0 shift to future)" 

. * OECD Countries
. gen shift_future_oecd = price_oecd_future - price_oecd_now 

. lab var shift_future_oecd "Shift to future: OECD (if>0 shift to future)"

. * Least Developed Countries
. gen shift_future_ldc = price_ldc_future  - price_ldc_now

. lab var shift_future_ldc "Shift to future: Home (if>0 shift to future)"

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. // Region- and time-specific carbon price suggestions
. ** Logarithms of prices suggested prices for home, OECD, LDC / now, future
. foreach var in price_home_now price_oecd_now price_ldc_now price_home_future p
> rice_oecd_future price_ldc_future {
  2. gen ln_`var' = log(`var' + 1)
  3. }

. lab var ln_price_home_now "Ln of Price Home Now"

. lab var ln_price_oecd_now "Ln of Price OECD Now"

. lab var ln_price_ldc_now "Ln of Price LDCs Now"

. lab var ln_price_home_future "Ln of Price Home Future"

. lab var ln_price_oecd_future "Ln of Price OECD Future"

. lab var ln_price_ldc_future "Ln of Price LDCs Future"

. 
. ** Categorizing the ambitions of delegates for prices now and in the future
. gen ambition_home_fut = .
(277 missing values generated)

. replace ambition_home_fut = 1 if price_home_now < 60  & price_home_future < 60
>   // Low ambition
(148 real changes made)

. replace ambition_home_fut = 2 if price_home_now < 60  & price_home_future >= 6
> 0 // Shift to future
(50 real changes made)

. replace ambition_home_fut = 3 if price_home_now >= 60 & price_home_future < 60
>   // Shift to now
(3 real changes made)

. replace ambition_home_fut = 4 if price_home_now >= 60 & price_home_future >= 6
> 0 // High ambition
(76 real changes made)

. lab define ambition_fut 1 "Low ambition" 2 "Future pay more" 3 "Now pay more" 
> 4 "High ambition", replace

. lab val ambition_home_fut ambition_fut

. 
. 
. 
. // Principal components

. * Winsorized variable of technological optimism (used for robustness test)
. winsor2 tech_ms_pca, suffix(_win) cuts(5 95)

. clear all               

. *version 16              // Set Version number for backward compatibility
. set more off            

. set linesize 80         

. macro drop _all        

. set matsize 2000
set matsize ignored.
    Matrix sizes are no longer limited by c(matsize) in modern Statas.  Matrix
    sizes are now limited by flavor of Stata.  See limits for more details.

. * -------------------------------------------------
.

. *--------------------------------------------------
. * Directory
. *--------------------------------------------------
. 
. * Max (G-Drive)

> tes\4_Carbon_Prices\STATA"

. global workpath   "$stata\DO-FILES"

. global datapath   "$stata\DTA-FILES"

. * Description
. *--------------------------------------------------
. /*

> pt. (0)"

> ion (0)"

. /*
> Three participants answered the survey twice; same e-mail adress twice in data
> set. For each couple, same name&lastname:
> 
> Date            firstname                               lastname              
>   email
> 04.11.2020      Ram Prasad                              Awasthi               
>   awasthiramprasad@gmail.com
> 16.02.2021      Ram                                             Awasthi       
>           awasthiramprasad@gmail.com
> 
> 02.12.2020      Nagla                                   Jebory                
>   nagla_fnc@yahoo.com
> 05.11.2020      Nagla Mahgoub Hamadain  Jebory                  nagla_fnc@yaho
> o.com
> 
> 06.11.2020      Augustin                                Ngenzirabona    augung
> enzi@yahoo.fr
> 25.03.2021      Ngenzirablna                    Augustin                augung
> enzi@yahoo.fr
> 
> Keep first entry of each
> */
. drop if firstname == "Ram" & lastname == "Awasthi"
(1 observation deleted)

. drop if firstname == "Nagla Mahgoub Hamadain" & lastname == "Jebory"
(1 observation deleted)

. drop if firstname == "Ngenzirablna" & lastname == "Augustin"
(1 observation deleted)

. 
. 
. 
.

  3. replace `var'="Somewhat unimportant" if `var'== "Somewhatunimportant"
  4. replace `var'="Not important at all" if `var'== "Notimportant at all"
  5. }

. lab def conti 1 "Africa" 2 "Asia" 3 "Europe" 4 "North America" 5 "South Americ
> a" 6 "Oceania", replace

. drop continent

. rename continent2 continent

. lab var continent "Continent"

. /* Classification of Education [Answers loaded into excel and re-imported]

> stUse\Donia_Delegates\4_Carbon_Prices\STATA\XLS-FILES\Classification_education
> .xlsx", sheet("Tabelle1") firstrow clear
> 
> 
> /*
> Specification in left columns
> 
> rename Agriculture edu_agri
> lab var edu_agri "Agricultural education"
> rename Biology edu_bio
> lab var edu_bio "Biological education"
> rename Climateenvironmentalscience edu_cli_env
> lab var edu_cli_env "Climate/Environmental science education"
> rename EconomicsBusiness edu_econ_bus
> lab var edu_econ_bus "Economic/business education"
> rename Developmentstudies edu_development
> lab var edu_development "Development studies education"
> rename Engineering edu_engineering
> lab var edu_engineering "Engineering education"
> rename Law edu_law
> lab var edu_law "Law"
> rename Other edu_other_specification
> lab var edu_other_specification "Other education"
> 
> foreach var in edu_agri edu_bio edu_cli_env edu_econ_bus edu_development edu_e
> ngineering {
> replace `var'= 0 if `var'== .
> }
> 
> replace edu_other_specification = 1 if edu_agri == 0 & edu_bio == 0 & edu_cli_
> env == 0 & edu_econ_bus == 0 & edu_development == 0 & edu_engineering == 0
> replace edu_other_specification = 0 if edu_agri != 0 | edu_bio != 0 | edu_cli_
> env != 0 | edu_econ_bus != 0 | edu_development != 0 | edu_engineering != 0
> 
> */
> 
> 
> * Specification in right columns
> rename natural_science educ_nat
> lab var educ_nat "Natural science educcation"
> rename economics educ_econ
> lab var educ_econ "Economics/business educcation"
> rename law educ_law
> lab var educ_law "Law educcation"
> rename social_sciences educ_social
> lab var educ_social "Social science educcation (other than econ/busin)"
> rename socialnatural educ_social_nat
> lab var educ_social_nat "Social & nautral sciences educcation"
> rename engineering educ_engin
> lab var educ_engin "Engineering educcation"
> rename U educ_other
> lab var educ_other "Other edcuation"
> rename climateenvironmentsustainabili env_cli_sust
> lab var env_cli_sust "Education related to enviornmental/climatic/sustainabili
> ty topics"
> 
> foreach var in educ_nat educ_econ educ_law educ_social educ_social_nat educ_en
> gin educ_other env_cli_sust {
> replace `var'= 0 if `var'== .
> }
> 
> replace educ_other = 1 if educ_nat == 0 & educ_econ == 0 & educ_law == 0 & edu
> c_social == 0 & educ_social_nat == 0 & educ_engin == 0 & educ_other == 0
> replace educ_other = 0 if educ_nat != 0 | educ_econ != 0 | educ_law != 0 | edu
> c_social != 0 | educ_social_nat != 0 | educ_engin != 0 | educ_other != 0
> 
> gen educ_type = .
> replace educ_type = 1 if educ_nat == 1
> replace educ_type = 2 if educ_econ == 1 
> replace educ_type = 3 if educ_social == 1
> replace educ_type = 4 if educ_social_nat == 1
> replace educ_type = 5 if educ_law == 1
> replace educ_type = 6 if educ_engin == 1
> replace educ_type = 7 if educ_other == 1
> lab var educ_type "Education type"
> lab define educ_type1 1 "Natural sciences" 2 "Economics/Business" 3 "Other soc
> ial sciences" 4 "Mix social & natural sciences" 5 "Law" 6 "Engineering" 7 "Oth
> er"
> lab val educ_type educ_type1
> 
> 
> keep id edu_specify educ_type educ_nat educ_econ educ_law educ_social educ_soc
> ial_nat educ_engin educ_other env_cli_sust
> 
> save "$datapath\edu_classification.dta", replace
> 
> 
> 
> 
> * Merge
> use "$datapath\delegates_clean1.dta", clear
> merge 1:1 id using "$datapath\edu_classification.dta", force
> 
> drop if _merge == 2 // doubles deleted
> drop _merge
> */

. *--------------
. * IV) Merge country-specifics
. *--------------
. 
. // World development indices
. *import excel "$xls\WDI_Indexes_average 2015-2019", sheet("Sheet1") firstrow c
> ase(lower) clear
. 
. import excel "$xls\Data_Extract_From_World_Development_Indicators", sheet("Dat
> a") firstrow case(lower) clear
(9 vars, 1,601 obs)

. foreach var in yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019 {
  2. replace `var' = "." if `var' == ".."
  3. }
(325 real changes made)
(333 real changes made)
(333 real changes made)
(336 real changes made)
(581 real changes made)

. destring yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019, replace
yr2015: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(330 missing values generated)
yr2016: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(338 missing values generated)
yr2017: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(338 missing values generated)
yr2018: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(341 missing values generated)
yr2019: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(586 missing values generated)

. encode countrycode, generate(country_code)

. egen average = rowmean(yr2015 yr2016 yr2017 yr2018 yr2019)
(329 missing values generated)

. keep countryname average seriesname

. drop if countryname == ""
(3 observations deleted)

. 
. * Reshape to wide
. egen indicator = group(seriesname)
(2 missing values generated)

. drop if indicator == . // Datasource information
(2 observations deleted)

. 
. /* 
> 1: CO2 emissions (metric tons per capita)       
> 2: Droughts, floods, extreme temperatures (% of population, average 1990-2009)
> 3: GDP (constant 2015 US$); 
> 4: GDP growth (annual %)
> 5: GDP per capita (constant 2015 US$)
> 6: Population, total
> */
. 
. drop seriesname 

. encode countryname , gen(country_code)

. reshape wide average , i(country_code) j(indicator)
(note: j = 1 2 3 4 5 6)

Data                               long   ->   wide
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Number of obs.                     1596   ->     266
Number of variables                   4   ->       8

yr2019: all characters numeric; replaced as double
(26 missing values generated)

> 2: Government Effectiveness: Estimate; 3: Regulatory Quality: Estimate; 4: Voi
> ce and Accountability: Estimate

.

(note: j = 1 2 3 4)

    matched                               277  (_merge==3)
    -----------------------------------------

. *ed country_home _merge if _merge == 1
. drop if _merge == 2
(115 observations deleted)

. sum income_level low_income lower_middle_income upper_middle_income high_incom
> e 

    Variable |        Obs        Mean    Std. Dev.       Min        Max
-------------+---------------------------------------------------------
income_level |        277    2.512635    1.051579          1          4
  low_income |        277    .1805054     .385304          0          1
lower_midd~e |        277    .3718412     .484171          0          1
upper_midd~e |        277    .2021661    .4023423          0          1
 high_income |        277    .2454874    .4311547          0          1

. drop _merge

. 
. * Delegation
. merge m:1 firstname lastname using "$datapath\delegation.dta" // 

    Result                           # of obs.
    -----------------------------------------
    not matched                             1
        from master                         1  (_merge==1)
        from using                          0  (_merge==2)

    matched                               276  (_merge==3)
    -----------------------------------------

. *ed country_home _merge if _merge == 1
. drop if _merge == 2
(0 observations deleted)

. drop _merge

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. ** Keep & Order
. * Keep
. keep  ///
> /*Added vars*/ treat_tech t_env t_own_delegation ///
> /* Socio-Demographics*/ id country_delegation country_home country_citizen con
> tinent gender female birth_yr age info_cc_1 info_cc_2 info_cc_3 info_cc_4 info
> _cc_5 influential_1 influential_2 influential_3 influential_4 influential_5 in
> fluential_6 organization edu edu_specify ///
> /*Output Vars*/ temp_rise carbon_price accecpt_global_carbon accept_gdp_reduce
>   price_home_now price_oecd_now price_ldc_now price_home_future price_oecd_fut
> ure price_ldc_future glob_nat_interest ///
> /*Mindset: Environmental Mindset*/ env_ms_1 env_ms_2 env_ms_3 env_ms_4 env_ms_
> 5 env_ms_1_read env_ms_2_read env_ms_3_read env_ms_4_read env_ms_5_read env_sh
> ared_oppinion env_know  ///
> /*Mindset: Economic Mindset*/ tech_ms_1 tech_ms_2 tech_ms_3 tech_ms_4 tech_ms_
> 5 tech_ms_6 tech_ms_1_read tech_ms_2_read tech_ms_3_read tech_ms_4_read tech_m
> s_5_read tech_ms_6_read econ_shared_oppinion econ_know ///
> /*Others*/ agreement cops_attended influence book book1 book2 book3 ///
> /*Ratchet & NDCs*/ question1_1 question1_2 question1_3 question2_1 question2_2
>  question2_3 question2_4 question2_5 question2_6 question3_1 question3_2 quest
> ion3_3 question3_4 question4 question5_1 question5_2 question5_3 question5_4 q
> uestion5_5 question5_6 question5_7 question5_8 question6 question7 ///
> /*Article 6 and Carbon Markets*/ question_b1 question_b2 question_b3 question_
> b4_1 question_b4_2 question_b4_3 question_b4_4 ///
> /*Negotiation Approach*/  negotiate1 negotiate2 negotiate3 negotiate4 negotiat
> e5 negotiate6 negotiate7 ///
> /*Country-Characteristics*/ gdppc co2_emissionpc population exposure_gain capa
> city_gain vuln_gain readiness_gain gain_index cri_rank cri_score fatalities_20
> 18_rank fatalaties_pc losses_total losses_gdp oecd ldc income_level low_income
>  lower_middle_income upper_middle_income high_income control_corr gov_effect r
> egul_quality accountability fuel_exporting resource_rich g77 comment

. 
. 
. 
. * Order 
. order  ///
> /*Added vars*/ treat_tech t_env t_own_delegation ///
> /* Socio-Demographics*/ id country_delegation country_home country_citizen con
> tinent gender female birth_yr age info_cc_1 info_cc_2 info_cc_3 info_cc_4 info
> _cc_5 influential_1 influential_2 influential_3 influential_4 influential_5 in
> fluential_6 organization edu edu_specify ///

>   price_home_now price_oecd_now price_ldc_now price_home_future price_oecd_fut
> ure price_ldc_future glob_nat_interest ///

> 5 env_ms_1_read env_ms_2_read env_ms_3_read env_ms_4_read env_ms_5_read env_sh
> ared_oppinion env_know  ///
> /*Mindset: Economic Mindset*/ tech_ms_1 tech_ms_2 tech_ms_3 tech_ms_4 tech_ms_
> 5 tech_ms_6 tech_ms_1_read tech_ms_2_read tech_ms_3_read tech_ms_4_read tech_m
> s_5_read tech_ms_6_read econ_shared_oppinion econ_know ///
> /*Others*/ agreement cops_attended influence book book1 book2 book3 ///
> /*Ratchet & NDCs*/ question1_1 question1_2 question1_3 question2_1 question2_2
>  question2_3 question2_4 question2_5 question2_6 question3_1 question3_2 quest
> ion3_3 question3_4 question4 question5_1 question5_2 question5_3 question5_4 q
> uestion5_5 question5_6 question5_7 question5_8 question6 question7 ///
> /*Article 6 and Carbon Markets*/ question_b1 question_b2 question_b3 question_
> b4_1 question_b4_2 question_b4_3 question_b4_4 ///
> /*Negotiation Approach*/  negotiate1 negotiate2 negotiate3 negotiate4 negotiat
> e5 negotiate6 negotiate7 ///
> /*Country-Characteristics*/ gdppc co2_emissionpc population exposure_gain capa
> city_gain vuln_gain readiness_gain gain_index cri_rank cri_score fatalities_20
> 18_rank fatalaties_pc losses_total losses_gdp oecd ldc income_level low_income
>  lower_middle_income upper_middle_income high_income control_corr gov_effect r
> egul_quality accountability fuel_exporting resource_rich g77 comment

.

> n_Prices\STATA\DTA-FILES\delegates_final.dta saved

. * Save for upload 
. keep temp_rise carbon_price price_home_now price_oecd_now price_ldc_now price_
> home_future price_oecd_future price_ldc_future cops_attended treat_tech t_own_
> delegation env_ms_1 env_ms_2 env_ms_3 env_ms_4 env_ms_5 negotiate1 negotiate2 
> negotiate3 negotiate4 negotiate5 negotiate6 negotiate7 tech_ms_1 tech_ms_2 tec
> h_ms_3 tech_ms_4 tech_ms_5 tech_ms_6 info_cc_1 info_cc_2 info_cc_3 info_cc_4 i
> nfo_cc_5 edu organization influence book book1 book2 book3 continent income_le
> vel low_income lower_middle_income upper_middle_income high_income 

. 
. save "C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Do
> nia_Delegates\8_Submission\analysis\datadelegates_clean.dta", replace
file C:\Users\Max Burger\HESSENBOX\2-Projekte (Björn Vollan)\Paper SustUse\Donia
> _Delegates\8_Submission\analysis\datadelegates_clean.dta saved

. 
.

. erase "$datapath\delegates_ecol_others.dta"

end of do-file

> a_Delegates\8_Submission\analysis\scripts\01 - clean.do"

. *--------------------------------------------------
. * Program Setup
. *--------------------------------------------------
. clear all               

. *version 16              // Set Version number for backward compatibility
. set more off            

. set linesize 80         

. macro drop _all        

. set matsize 2000
set matsize ignored.
    Matrix sizes are no longer limited by c(matsize) in modern Statas.  Matrix
    sizes are now limited by flavor of Stata.  See limits for more details.

. * -------------------------------------------------
. 
. 
. *--------------------------------------------------
. * Directory
. *--------------------------------------------------
. 
. * Max (G-Drive)
. global stata "C:\Users\Max Burger\Google Drive\Promotion\Projects\Donia_Delega
> tes\4_Carbon_Prices\STATA"

. global workpath   "$stata\DO-FILES"

. global datapath   "$stata\DTA-FILES"

. global output     "$stata\OUTPUT"

. global xls        "$stata\XLS-FILES"

. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. 
. *--------------------------------------------------
. * Description
. *--------------------------------------------------
. /*
> I) Importing files
> II) Appending files to one dataset
> III) Cleaning
>         i) Renaming & Encoding
> IV) Unifying country-names and assigning to continents
> V) Merge country-specifics
> */
. *--------------------------------------------------
. 
. 
. 
.

.
